questions.questionText: What's Pam's favorite flavor of yogurt?
What does Michael make a ton of for him and Pam on the morning of the first day of the Michael Scott Paper Company?
What acronym does Creed come up with during his brief reign as manager?
'_______, your teeth called. Your breath stinks. Boom roasted.'
Aside from Jim, who in the office has an obvious crush on Pam throughout the show?
Jim sends an urgent message back to Dwight posing as Dwight from the future, warning him that something in the office was poisoned. What was it?
What radio station stickers are seen around the office?
What kind of sauce does Kevin ask for when being forced to eat broccoli as part of his New Year's resolution?
What does Michael eat instead of ice cream because they don't have any?
During the episode, Prince Family Paper, what's the secret signal that Dwight and Michael agree on using?
What does Michael's girlfriend, Carol, dress up as to Kelly's Diwali party?
And lastly, how much did Michael's beloved plasma TV cost?
